Name: Full Metal Body
Effect: The User is immune to negative Stat Changes inflicted by other pokemon. The User's Stat Changes may still be directly overwritten or transferred (the User is affected normally by effects such as ex: Haze, Baton Pass, Topsy-Turvy).
Description: This Pokemon's body is a think metal armor, its shiny coat cannot be muddled. Look inside of it and you may be blinded by the sun's brightness.
